short_effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.
